forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Periods of light rain this morning. High near 55F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 13C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High around 55F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 56F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies, with gusty winds developing overnight. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Gusty winds after midnight. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain. High 12C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. High 54F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High 53F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 53F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 55F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
